## Polynomial Regression 

- Simple linear regression   y = b0 + b1*X
- Multiple Linear Regression y = b0 + b1*X1 + b2*X2 + b3*X3 .... + bnXn
- Polynomial Lienar Regression y = b0 + b1*X1 + b2*X2^2 + b3*X3^3 .... + bnXn^n
